duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect and test a wide variety of parts, assemblies, and materials to ensure compliance with customer requirements and quality standards.
Operate measuring and test equipment, including Geometric Dimensioning & Tolerancing (GD & T) and Laser Tracker (LEICA type) equipment for in-process manufacturing.
Provide electronic and hard copy reports of inspections and notify appropriate parties, including project engineers.
Observe testing and provide quality oversight to verify compliance with requirements and standards.
Interact with regulatory agencies and customers during audits and reviews of company inspection and calibration activities.
Coordinate the procurement of standard materials, services, and parts for inspections.
Observe all laws, regulations, and other applicable obligations in a safe and responsible manner.
Perform other duties as assigned or required.
